Test Name: Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) RNA Quantification with Reflex to HCV Genotype
Purpose: To quantify HCV RNA and determine the viral genotype in serum specimens for diagnostic and monitoring purposes.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument, centrifuge, pipettes/micropipettes, vortex mixer, biosafety cabinet
